Open Source

Every story is made of fragments.

Errata is an AI-assisted writing app where prose, characters, guidelines, and knowledge are all fragments. They compose into rich context that brings your stories to life.

The Foundation

Everything is a fragment.

Fragments are atomic units of story. Each one carries a piece of your world — a character sketch, a rule, a piece of lore, a passage of prose. They compose together to form rich context for AI generation.

Prose

pr-****

Your story text. The living body of your narrative, written by you or generated by AI.

Characters

ch-****

Personalities, backstories, motivations. They inform every generation the AI produces.

Guidelines

gl-****

Stylistic rules, tone directives, narrative constraints. Guide the AI's voice and approach.

Knowledge

kn-****

World-building facts, lore, timelines. The grounding truth that keeps your world consistent.

The Pipeline

From fragments to story.

Errata's generation pipeline composes your fragments into rich context, runs them through AI with fragment tools, and produces continuations that respect your world.

01

Compose

Sticky fragments load in full. Non-sticky fragments appear as shortlists. The context builder assembles a complete picture of your world.

02

Generate

The LLM receives your context and input. It can use fragment tools to read, edit, and create fragments during generation.

03

Integrate

New prose saves as a fragment. The librarian agent updates summaries, tracks characters, and flags contradictions automatically.

Capabilities

Built for serious writers.

Plugin System

Extend with custom fragment types, LLM tools, API routes, and pipeline hooks. Your workflow, your rules.

Streaming Generation

Watch your story unfold in real-time with full tool-use transparency and debug inspection.

Librarian Agent

A background AI that maintains summaries, detects character mentions, and flags contradictions.

No Database

Pure filesystem storage. Your stories are JSON files you can read, version, and back up. Zero lock-in.

Type-Safe API

End-to-end type safety with Elysia. Server calls bypass HTTP in SSR. Full TypeScript throughout.

Open Architecture

Swap LLM providers. Write custom plugins. Fork and extend. Errata is designed to be yours.

Open Source

Write with fragments.
Build with us.

Errata is open source and free. Join the community, contribute plugins, or just start writing.
